1.0.name: wordpress/nuntius
1.0.description: If you've been itching to turn your blog into an online newspaper or magazine, Nuntius could be your perfect companion. Based on the highly-popular News theme by Justin Tadlock, Nuntius offers an advanced, news-style page template that lets you highlight sticky posts and featured categories.
